technical_specifications.lighting: Bright natural lighting, soft diffused, avoid harsh shadows

production_notes: Scene 5 (powder dissolving) is the HERO SHOT - allocate 30% of generation attempts to perfecting this
Use separate scene prompts for maximum control over each shot
Use combined prompts for faster generation if you need a complete video quickly
Consider generating multiple versions of Scene 5 with different angles (side profile vs top-down)
Generate alternative context scenes (8b, 8c, 8d) to create multiple video versions for different audiences
Vertical 9:16 format is optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and Stories
No text overlays in the Veo prompts - add all text, logos, and CTAs in post-production editing
Ensure BILAN branding (logo, packet design) is clearly visible in scenes 2, 4, 12, and 13
For authentic look, mention 'photorealistic' and 'natural lighting' in every prompt
Slow motion scenes (1, 5, 9) should specify '120fps slow motion' for smooth dramatic effect
veo_generation_tips: Start with individual scenes for better quality control
Generate Scene 5 (hero shot) first - if this looks good, proceed with others
If a scene doesn't generate well, try the alternative version or adjust the prompt slightly
Veo 3 excels at slow motion fluid dynamics - maximize this for powder and water scenes
For person scenes (8-11), you may need to generate multiple times to get authentic expressions
Keep prompts under 500 characters for best results
Mention 'vertical 9:16 format' in every prompt to ensure proper framing
Use 'photorealistic' consistently for brand consistency across all generated scenes
